page.title: 12ST.DUNSTANS.
page.content:
At the southernmost point of Ovingdean, and to the west of Rottingdean, lies St. Dunstans, a residential home for the blind. The design of this west facing, 6 storey yellow brick building situated between the busy A259 south coast road and the rolling fields of the South Downs does not fit well with the nearby residential development.
To the left of the building lies a coach and car lined driveway. There are extensive lawns and shrubbery, and walkways with railings for the assistance of its inhabitants, and a subway to the undercliff and beach. It is a pleasant sight to see relatives and stff walking with the inhabitants.
